name: Religion in the Game of Thrones
description: Religion weaves complex social logics and social rationales imbedded in all levels of culture. This course explores multiple questions of religion as a cultural element, both visible and invisible. Theories of religion as well as questions of gender, authority, and power will be examined. The course culminates in a student project oriented toward an academically oriented â€œHandbookâ€ for the study of religion in the Game of Thrones.
department: Department for the Study of Religion
